11331212211211.content:
When the truck was completely stopped, Tera reached out and scooped up the shrunken person. “Can I at least get— wait!” it happened so fast. She was once again caught between impossibly strong, oily fingers. The air rushes by, and she frantically tried to think of what to say to her. A goodbye of some kind? Some final words? Reagan didn't get the chance before she was craned in towards Tera's large, pudgy lips and unceremoniously popped her into her mouth. It was a casual routine for Tera, who smacked her lips for a moment then proceeded to suck on the small girl like any other piece of food.

She didn’t get out a peep before she was chucked into a slippery hot plain of gooey suds and spongey bits of food. Reagan stopped her entrance, rolling over the pink mat and skidding to a stop at the base of a dimpled basin. She opened her eyes, partly expecting it to end there.

If only she were so lucky.

Her eyes met the border of teeth and the inner lining of the woman’s lips before they smacked closed without warning. Reagan was in darkness, and the pudgy muscle she’d mistaken for a floor heaved up into her. She gasped as the muscle pressed her into a hard, ridged surface, molding around her entire body like a vacuum seal before violently brushing itself over her. Again and again it assaulted her along with waves of hot, gooey spit gushing around her like crashing underground rapids.

She wanted to be ready. She’d imagined what her own shrink snacks went through to understand what was coming. Tried to picture it when she had nothing better to do in the gas station for close to fifty plus hours, convincing herself that she’d be less afraid when her time came. Nothing could prepare her, and nothing held back the primal fear that was bursting out of her like a broken hydrant.

Reagan Shrom screamed, scratching and pushing fruitlessly into the tongue, getting her wish for freedom only to be tossed elsewhere, tears imperceivable amongst the torrent of saliva and leftover coke residue.
11331212211211.title: Redlight Means End of Life

113312122112112.content:
Tera hummed along to the music as she sucked on her final treat. She was bored at this light. She always was. This was the only light for at least a hundred miles and it was only because the intersecting road was also a major highway. But still, way out here, no one was really on the road.

She sighed as she sucked on the treat, wishing for the light to turn. Slipping her over and under her tongue. For once, having spent time with the girl, she paid more attention to her feeble squirming. It was cute, but also carried some disturbing undertones Tera didn't care too much to dwell on. After all, why ruin her mood?
__________________________________________________________________

Her limbs and head had been beaten and bent from banging into the giant teeth, passed from cheek to cheek and savaged atop and under the tongue in random sequences. Reagan’s breath was wasted when she could only breathe in spit. At one point, she accidentally ingested a gooey crumb of a long eaten chip while being scooped between the cheek and molars.

Reagan wondered if this was the same experience for her own food. Carelessly tossed and savored with no remorse. What hope she had that her friendly chat might’ve given her an easier death was dashed. Then she wondered if this was an easier death?

She gave her morsels time to think. To plea. Stopping her onslaught to give them hope that it’d stop, even opening her mouth to tease them with release. She’d draw this out the most, letting them get as far as her bottom lip before snapping them closed. A quick slurp and gulp, and they were done. The fear was delicious, one of her favorite things to illicit from her tinies. Reagan never considered how they truly must've felt, and none of what she theorized quite lived up to the true dread of being molested by a slathering field of muscle and drool, flung and ferried into every dark, damp, squishy corner of a strangers mouth, trembling and crying to such an insignificant extent that her infinitesimal horror meant absolutely nothing to the world beyond her slobbery torment.
__________________________________________________________________

For the time she humored the girl, it didn't make her taste much different from the others. Instead, Tera tapped along to the beat, bobbing her head a little as well and swishing the jelly bean of a person into her cheeks then back. Finally, the light turned. With a relieved sigh, she swallowed. Without even waiting a second, she raised her cup and took a long swig to wet her mouth, then hit the gas.

“Two hundred miles to go, Muts” she sighed.
__________________________________________________________________

Tera didn’t have the taste for drawing things out like the small girl had. Reagan was bucked to the sealed gullet and shoved down with little fanfare. A fat GULP ferried her down the pulsating tunnel. There was now time and room to rest and whimper, the walls simply conveying her down feet first instead of aggressively pushing into her. Any second now, she’d plop into her grave...

Before that could happen, another gulp echoed above, then another, and a flood of brown, fizzing liquid cascaded onto her head, quickly filling the small space she occupied in the esophagus. Luckily, the fluid also sped along her fall, and she spurted out into a lake of thick bile and bubbling carbonation. Without her ears being squeezed mercilessly, the heartbeat and grumbles were finally noticeable. The bodily noises resounded mightily with each gushing churn of the chamber. Reagan was forced to swim, knocking into the kneading rubbery walls for any possible handhold. The rush of massive airflow heard through the walls reminded her she had to breath, and there wasn’t much air here, either from being stuck inside an organ where oxygen didn’t belong or the carbon dioxide from the cola. Her arms were atrophied from her time in the packaging, leaving her no strength to stay above the surface. Getting light headed, she wanted to hold onto anything to feel like she had control. To have some bearing to say she could die with dignity. By the time her eyes glazed over, and her body was rocked across the surface of the pool, her arms gave out. She meekly kicked to prolong herself.

Then something more solid then the mush she felt around her legs floated into her. Frightened by the invasion of her space, probably the least of her concerns, she realized the floating mass might be a way to avoid the constant swimming. She desperately paddled toward the mass, floundering her arms over the top of it for salvation. Instead, the bulk sunk just as easily, forcing her back under. As long as she was fully submerged, she felt the light tingling begin to encompass her entire being. Quickly, she pulled up the aimless mass, kicking to the surface with all her will. Finally, she broke through, but then came to realize what she was holding.

It was the Australian. Drowned and dead. Her little heart sank. She'd forgotten how many others were in here with her, so focused on her own predicament. How many made it down whole like him? How many body parts and viscera had she floated by already?

Terrified, she pushed the corpse away, left once again to madly tread water in the frothing, pulsing pond of soda and chyme. The walls were closing in further, pushing the water line higher up and threatening to pull Reagan under. She refused, kicking more and more as the tingling she felt earlier soon became burning.

"No! NO PLEASE! ERIN!! DADDY!!! SOMEONE!!!?!?"

In the end, the stomach clenched around her, condensing until all but a small pocket of space lie between her and the top. At this compression, the noxious air gathered at the sphincter overhead and rushed up and out.

That was the last thing Reagan Shrom saw before being unable to find her next breath, and slipping under the hot, bubbling surface...
__________________________________________________________________

Tera took another drink of her soda, draining the last of the large cup. She belched loudly and licked her lips. She was bored again. As per usual. Still, it was her lot in life, she knew what she signed on for and loved what the life provided for her. Glancing over at her dog, she found a funny sight and snorted loudly to herself, her diaphragm bouncing with her laughter likely shaking up her guts.

“Mutsy! Your face!” She laughed. He had blood and some gore all over his smiling muzzle while happily accepting his momma's attention. She pulled him into her lap and wiped his face with a napkin, petting his stinky fur. When he was as clean as he'd get without a bath, she gave him a kiss and put him back in the passenger seat.

“Next time I’ll get you your own bag,” she promised.
113312122112112.title: Nothin' special. *GULP*

11331212211212.content:
Tera's hand descended upon Reagan with evoking a sense of doom and finality from her. Her flight instinct was triggered like never before as she attempted to flee. She wasn't running anywhere in particular, all she knew was that she had to get away from a predator she had no hope in fighting off.


The effort was ultimately futile, as Tera's plump forefinger and thumb pinched around Reagan's right ankle effortlessly, causing her to let loose an involuntary shriek. The ground dissipated from beneath her as she was lifted up above Tera's hungry mouth, dangling upside down. As if it were in slow motion, her mouth opened wide.


It seemed Tera was taking advantage of being stopped and not having to keep her eyes on the road as she focused on the last part of her meal.


Reagan could hear her heart in her ears. The constant noise of the trucks idle engine faded away. Her vision tunneled towards the immediate threat, taking in all the details. The rock hard teeth littered with desposits of unswallowed food, the fleshy tongue coated in saliva, and worst of all, the throat framed by tonsils and uvula, a hellish organic gate from which there was no hope of return.


In her panic she was able to find her voice and yell out "Tera, please wait!"


Her descent stopped just above the mouth. She could feel the hot breath wafting over her, it smelled of chilidog and coke mixed with halitosis. In the back of her mind, Reagan knew the smell would be even stronger inside Tera's belly, heightening her sense of fear and humiliation.


Tera did not respond verbally, but raised an eyebrow as if to say "Well, what is it?" Reagan knew this was her last chance. She composed her self as quickly as she could and began to sob and beg for her life.


"I-I know that we just met, and that you d-don't owe me anything but please, from one woman to another, hear me out!" The fact that Tera could have easily ignored her and let go of her ankle and yet didn't emboldened Reagan further.
"I'm a person just like you with friends, family, and goals. It was all taken away from me when I was shrunk down along with my dignity and rights. I don't want it to all end like this! I don't want to die..."


Tera glanced at the light to make sure it was still red, then looked back at her pleading snack.


"If you eat me I'll end up dying slowly in your stomach, being turned in to a mushy sludge alone and scared in the dark. I know it will mean you are giving up the last part of the meal paid for, but to me it means everything! If you were in my position, wouldn't you want one last chance?" She yelled out, tears streaming down her face, snot running out of her nose. She was an absolute mess. "I'll do anything! Be your pet, slave, whatever you want! Please... just don't take my life away!"


Tera let out a sigh, glancing over to the light which was now sure to turn green any moment, then back to Reagan. The warm breeze of her captors sudden exhalation brushed past her face, a smell she was becoming all too familiar with. Tera lifted her back away from the mouth, letting her rest on her pudgy palm just below her face. The sound of the world slowly faded back in, the hum of the engine along with all the ambient noise outside returned.


"After a speech like that I s'pose its worth lettin' ya go. I'm not really that hungry anymore..." She let out an unapologetic belch, followed by a low rumble from her stomach, satisfied with her current meal. 'sides, you've kinda grown on me." she said with a faint smile. Reagan's face lit up and she started to smile, even laugh in disbelief while her face was still wet with snot and tears.


The light turned green and the truck started moving again, sounded by the hydraulics of the breaks hissing open. Tera set Reagan back down on the dashboard where she was plucked from, more gently than she had done when grabbing her, Reagan noticed.


"Here's the deal.."


What did Tera say next?

1142.content:
Sitting up, I shook my head to wake myself up. I had been on this wall for weeks, a simple PetSmart in the suburbs, waiting for someone to come in and take me home. It hadn't even been that large of a fine, just a missed court case for a traffic stop that put me in this situation. One minute I was sitting at home, minding my own business, the next a special task force was knocking on my door, and within an hour Iw as in the next delivery to the local pet shop.

Of course the degradation wasn't ever enough, every day reminding me of the merchandise I had become. Today was no different, the man in the bright blue store uniform depositing the pellets designed for miniature people such as myself making his rounds, leaving a few from the container in the trough I had been assigned. Reluctantly, I grabbed them, gnawing on them as I sat by my window to the store, watching the various customers browse their options.

An attractive young woman of around twenty three, my current age walked by holding the leash to a German Shepard. She examined the wall of tinies, before getting the assistance of the employee with the keys to cages to get out the one she wanted. I smiled as I knew at least someone would be freed from this store at least, and her new owner looked like a good person. As the employee dug out a brown haired man, I could see them escorting the woman and her dog to the cashier's table.

Once the woman checked out, I fully expected for her to put him in some bag, or her purse, but something much more evil was afoot.

"Sit... Sit..." She instructed the dog, as the German Shepard obeyed. Once it was in her desired position, she dangled the poor man over the head of the dog, who was nearly drooling in anticipation as the woman dropped him into the awaiting maw of the beast. My stomach dropped as she got on her knees and started to scratch the ears of the animal that had just devoured a human being alive. "Good girl!" She said as she stood up to speak to the employee. "I like to let her pick out her own treats, she really seemed to have an eye out for that one."

I stood petrified as she made her way out the door, realizing that some people had looks that were deceiving and that was one of them. I simply relaxed, happy that I wasn't a dog treat for the day, and waited for time to fly by. However, the day was not over, and sooner than later my new owner came in, looking in my cage and requesting for the employee to take me to check out. It was

11422.content:
As I watched out the glass, I contemplated what had happened to me. It was unjust, and hopefully the person who decided to take me home with them would see It from the same perspective. On the other hand, they were way more likely to just treat me like a pet, and that was something that I also had to brace myself for. After all, they were buying me from a pet store, where there was food, cages, and toys designed just for people like me, for people like them to give to their pets.


The wait didn't last much longer however, as I saw the woman from nearly a mile away, well it looked like a mile to me, but in reality it was just the front of the store. Surely if I could have seen the other men in the wall they would have the same look of ecstasy as me, my jaw nearly dropping as though I were in a cartoon from the 1950's when I saw the middle aged blonde woman stroll through the store, obviously aware of the attention she drew by the way she strutted. I had never seen a more voluptuous woman as her rather expensive looking top exposed her obviously fake tits.

Making everyone even more excited, something that I personally couldn't hide, due to my lack of clothing, she made her way towards the wall, starting to examine her options. My erection was rock solid as she bent over, the massive orbs of flesh being pressed against the glass right in front of me as she slowly dragged them down, leaving a smear on the glass of her sweat. Eventually, her neck and head followed the path that her breasts had made, leaving me staring straight into the eyes of the gigantic woman.

"Hey there little guy! Excited to see me?" She laughed as she stared at my penis, still solid from the sight before. "You know, I've been looking for a little stud like you. I've been trying to get a new hobby, and I think breeding my own tinies ain't that bad of an idea! As we can see here, you got the ability to get hard, and a cute face. I think you check off all the boxes!" She said, before raising her head slightly to give me a look at the toothy smile that could engulf me entirely. She leaned in, giving the cage a kiss, before heading off to find the teenage girl in charge of unlocking our containers.

I watched in conflict, not knowing whether or not to be happy or scared at the prospect of becoming this lady's new little pet tiny. I could do nothing but wait to see what my outcome would become as I stared through the imprint that her lipstick had left on the glass, watching as the employee came over and unlocked my cage from above, the silky hand reaching in and tugging me up into the unknown. I was forced to ride in her grip as she carried me over to the cash register, my future owner following in quick pursuit. Her free hand tapped the buttons on the electronic screen, before she started to speak.

"That'll be twenty one, eighty three." She said joyfully as the large MILF handed her a twenty and a five.

"Keep the change, I can't wait to get my new tiny home." She said as I was deposited into her grip, still silky skin, but slightly more wrinkled than the younger girl. As she walked out of the store, I was kept in her palm, all the way to the nice Mercedes G-Wagon she had parked near the front of the lot. I didn't even process that this was my first time outside in so long, too caught up in thoughts about my new life. I realized that to afford this kind of vehicle, there must be quite the bit of money in her wallet, and at only twenty dollars excluding tax, I was easily replaced. But for now, she seemed to like me, and I planned to keep it that way.

As I was set in front of the windshield, I looked onward at the smiling giantess, now sporting a pair of Ray Bans sun glasses as she spoke to me.

1142243.content:
Kelly's huge, over manicured hands clutched the large burger and hoisted it away from the tray. I tried to look away when she took her first bite, the unavoidable fact that I could easily fit in her jaws making for a harrowing display of power. She was just having a normal lunch, crunching through layers of meat and watered down veggies loaded with the usual trans fats and preservatives that I used to eat regularly. Not that I'm proud of that, but what I wouldn't give to have an honest to god burger again.

Kelly must have noticed my staring, since she chuckled and jerked me out of my reminiscing, reminding me of the light horror I was living, "Oh right. You should eat too... well, grab a fry or something. However much you want. Can't eat that much anyway, right?" She winked, like she'd let him on some secret hookup when really she was just showing common decency. I'll take what I can get. At her assurance, I moved over to the knocked over pouch of fries and pulled out a small crispy one. It was tough to work my jaw around, but I managed to start from the ends and work my way in. The salty, fried taste was a bittersweet relief with just have glorious it was to enjoy something so bad for my health. Kelly must've thought something similar, "Now don't gorge yourself! Need you in good shape for the next step of our operation~."

I cringed internally, starting to be turned off by how giddily she pictured my oncoming forced mating. Ideally, she'd pair me with some cute girls, but even that would feel wrong under the pretext that it would always be forced. I kept eating, trying not to dwell too far on the myriad of implications she kept throwing my way.

Then a strange, unsettling sound caught my attention. The noise of coughing and sputtering came from the side of her sandwich, and from under the single, wide piece of lettuce, a single drop of food fell out and hit the paper cover of the tray. The noises had come from the renegade slaw, but on closer inspection, I saw that it was moving. Tiny arms far smaller than mine popped out of the thousand island glob covering the mass and used it push the little person up. They were about a quarter of my size, turning the head every which way as if they never thought they'd be able to stand on their own again.

Their sauce covered head turned my way, and his body perked up. Even if I was bigger, I was still another person to flee to, "He-hey! You!" He started stumbling my way, like his legs had been injured during his handling from factory to sandwich. He left a trail of thousand island as he crossed the tray, his now revealed eyes screaming for my help, "You- you have to help us!"

I wanted to help him, but I tensed and scooted closer to the forest of fries, unwilling to make any kind of risk while within clear view of my new owner. I was right to abstain, since she obviously saw the small goopy straggler hopping over to me.

Kelly scoffed, as if mildly offended, "Hey! What are you doing?" Her long nailed fingertips swiftly swooped down and whisked the smaller man up high. The older woman didn't even reprimand him before stuffing her fingers through her heavily glossed lips. She slurped her fingers out, wiping them and her fake nails on her napkin before going back to her burger. I couldn't tell if she chewed or left him whole, but I did watch the subtle bob of her lightly saggy neck as she swallowed him.

Even as the bulge disappeared, she was already taking her next bite. Now looking closely, with this latest experience in mind, I recognized several squirming lumps in the sandwich. Her order was loaded with tinier people that had been shrunk and distributed as fast food ingredients!

How easily could that have been me? If I didn't look good when I was arrested by conventional standards, would I have been in the same boat and now waiting to be churned away in some old woman's gut?

Kelly glanced at me, and a queer look crossed her overly treated brows, "What's wrong? You're done already?" She swallowed another large bite, then brought over a large finger to poke my gut. I tried not to show that she lightly knocked the wind out of me with such an inane action, "Aw, are you upset? I'm sorry he bothered. Some of these tinies just don't know their place. Trust me, you're special!" She chirped like what she said was encouraging, then returned to her meal. After several minutes of sloppy bites and subdued screams, her burger was gone, and she was wiping her fingers on her napkin.

"Hmm... I have to wash my hands. I'll be back in a minute."

Wait, she was leaving me here alone? Didn't she know how bad an idea that was!? Anyone could pop over and swipe me up like a happy meal toy, or just a happy meal! Then again, maybe this was my chance to escape. She'd be gone at least a minute, and if I played my cards right, I could make it down the table and hide under a bench before she returned. Was that even doable? More importantly, was it worth the risk?

She was already standing up to leave, and the time to make a decision was fast approaching...

choices: Being eaten with the sub.

11512.content:
Tim knew that at his current size, and as destined to be food, he will probably be the main ingredient of some meal rather than small part of the toppings. It also means that at this size he is going to be chewed bit by bit rather than swallowed whole. While sitting in the display plate at the groceries store, he considered what options he's facing.

During that time, when he thinks about the possibilities of being eaten and chewed alive inside a sandwich like his friend Ken, being bought as ingredient and cooked to death, or being slightly cooked and eaten alive, and thinking of the people that might buy him, a lady in business suite stood in front of the counter.

At first he didn’t gave much attention to her, as costumers came and went with tinies like him all day long. He was drenched in his thoughts and heard the lady ordering her sub, ignoring her as not every sub order contained tinies.
"Umm spread mayo, Umm lettuce, Emmental cheese.. Umm that tiny here..."

Suddenly Tim was shaken out of his world as metallic clamps grabbed him and laid him on his back on top of a soft yellow bed. It took him a second to grasp that he is finally chosen, and was put inside the sub which that business woman is ordering. As he laid on the cheese, the employee who's preparing the order uncovered the plastic tape from his mouth.

Now that it's clear for him what is going to happen, his entire attention is on the business woman. She looks in her 40's, has blonde hair, a bit taller than average, and beautiful face. If he needed to describe her further, she kinda reminded him the actress Jess McAllen. The woman continue her order.
"… umm and tomatoes, that's it."

Tim saw the employee put tomato slices on the other side of the bun and then she closed the sandwich. His entire front and face were blocked by the top part of the bread, and now he was facing the tomato slices. Their smell was strong being that close and their juice started dripping on him.
"Ma'am, do you want me to cut it in half or pack it whole?" the employee asked.

"No, leave it whole please, It might be a while before I'll actually eat it and I would like the tiny to stay as fresh as possible. Besides, I like to eat them alive and cut them with my teeth hehe."
Hearing this scared Tim very much, but he also knew there's nothing he can do at the point.

The sandwich with Tim was wrapped in paper and handed over to the woman. She paid and went out. Tim felt some movements and heard some noises, but couldn't tell exactly what's happening as everything was dark and he was stuck inside the tight pressing sandwich, unable to move.

Not that there was any point in moving or trying to escape. He was destined to be food in one way or another. Even if he did manage to somehow escape, he'll probably be immediately found by someone, who will grab him and eat him anyway. If not eaten, he might end being stepped on, crushed to death under someone's shoe, or being collected by someone who like to torture tinies for fun.

Tim was inside the sandwich, while the woman went to work. The sandwich was inside her bag, she planned on eating it later as she had a lot of work in her office and very little time to have a proper lunch break. Usually she buys a sub and eat it at some point while working. Some times, she just going through the entire day only on her morning's coffee and some snacks, before returning back home to have a proper meal. A lot of the time those snacks are shrunken people in various sizes, sold in bags for that purpose. Some are even flavored.

The long hours are passing as the woman is neck deep in tons of work. All the while Tim is still inside her sub, wondering why he sit there for so long. "Doesn’t she suppose to buy and then eat me? Why am I sitting here for so long? Did she forget about me? or she's just going to eat me later?" The smell and stickiness inside the sandwich grew stronger as the hours passed.

What will happen to Tim?

Will he be eaten entirely with the sub, chewed one piece at the time from the legs to the head, once the woman will take her late lunch break?

Or is she going to be so drowned in work so much, that she's gonna take 2 or 3 bites before throwing the rest of the unfinished sandwich to the trash, leaving Tim injured yet still alive with disgusting garbage?

Your dick was still hard. Although fatal, this whole experience is very sensual and hot. You thought about Emily, you'll never see her again. You hoped it's not too bad for her inside the groom's stomach. It was hard to actually comprehend that you were just eaten alive, and that’s the end. To add insult to injury, more chewed up, saliva drenched cake pieces were raining down on you, as well as some mouthfuls of beverages.

The situation you were in caused a mixture of deadly aspects. There was the lack of oxygen in the stomach air, the acids that slowly started to melt you, and also the disgusting, digesting food mush that tried to drown you underneath it.

Just before you passed out for good, you heard a girly scream of a shrunken woman snack the bride had as well.

132.content: Well you weren't going to make any progress by standing around the front porch, you started forward slowly in the hopes the dog wouldn't notice you. You'd made it about a foot when you saw the dog's ears perk up and its head swivel towards you, so stealth was out the window and you just ran. You ran as fast as you'd ever run in your life, listening to the dog chasing behind you. Just before the dog caught up to you you heard a clank and a yelp as the dog had reached the end of its chain. No longer able to chase you the dog barked after you until you'd escaped the front yard and reached the sidewalk, at which point the quitted down and slunk away. You stood panting and out of breath on the sidewalk, you were loose in the wide world and now just needed to find a way to live the rest of your life while ridiculously tiny. You figured you should make a plan, you could try to find a nicer normal size person who you could live with, you could also not risk running into a dangerous person so much by just remaining wild and scavenging from the normal sized people. One last option was that since you weren't in a big city you could just run off into the woods and try to survive in the giant world while avoiding people as much as possible.

1452.content:
(spider warning)

Nicole Bozmen looked with satisfaction upon her collection. Nicole had recently turned 27 and she'd managed to finally get really setup on a new hobby she'd been wanting to try, making her own tiny colony. Nicole had always loved interesting pets, and while some people had been delighted with just torturing tinies Nicole had seen an opportunity to experiment with her little pets. Nicole stood in the pet room of her apartment, she had several terrariums set up around the room and was very proud of how she could connect and disconnect each one with transparent tubing. Front and center was the newest occupants of the pet room, a terrarium filled with about forty tinies, Nicole had made sure they had enough food for the first few days. The tinies had been in there for one day already, it looked like some of them had managed to get shelters put together, although it seemed like the tinies were still arguing amongst themselves about how they should run their little colony, Nicole was very interested in seeing how that turned out. To the left of the Tinies' terrarium was a colony of black crazy ants, the ants were an older colony and worked together much better than the tinies did, Nicole was excited to one day connect the two terrariums and see who came out on top, but for now they'd need to stay separate or else the tinies would just get wiped out. To the right of the tinies' terrarium was actually an aquarium, but Nicole had made a little beach that tinies could walk out onto once the two tanks were connected, Nicole had liked the idea of leaving little treasures in the water for the tinies, but there were more than a few fish in the aquarium that would be happy to eat any tiny they found. The other two terrariums in the room couldn't actually connect to the others, but their inhabitants were big enough that Nicole could just move them from container to container herself. One contained a bullfrog who Nicole had named Spike, she giggled to herself a little at the idea of unleashing the monstrous frog on the tinies. The final terrarium contained the true monster of the pet room, the Mexican red knee tarantula named Cherry was the oldest of Nicole's pets at about 15 years old, Cherry was actually pretty docile but Nicole knew that at some point she'd need to unleash her on the tiny colony, maybe in the middle of the night to enhance the fear factor. Nicole couldn't wait to see what fun things she could do with her little tinies when combined with her other pets, the best part was that since it was Friday afternoon and Nicole's weekend was free she could spend her time in her watching how things progressed. For now Nicole decided to...

154.content:
Usually you don't participate in those things. You are a vanilla 26 years old student, minding his own business, staying at home and studying.

In your opinion, eating or torturing shrunken people is wrong. Although not a popular statement, you still see them as equal human beings. After all, they were normal people who got shrunk as a punishment for some crime they made, even a very small one.

Every day you watched people around you abuse tinies. The most common use for them was as food. In some cases, they were used as consumables and personal hygiene products. In rare cases they were found straying around, probably escaped from somewhere. If a norm would find a tiny strolling out there, they almost certainly would 'dispose' of them in some hurtful way like stepping on them or abducting them to torture them to death later at home.

At your university it was fairly common. The cafeteria sold shrunken people as snacks and toppings to go on almost every meal. Here and there you could see students eating sandwiches with small limbs, sometimes a head, dangling at the edges. Some tinies were modified in factories so they were flavored, or coated in something that made them feel like a juicy chewing gum. Whenever you saw someone chewing one of those it sent shivers down your spine. In addition, there were biology classes that used to dissect live tinies. Some professors and teachers were known to abuse tinies during lectures as some sort of giving examples.

You avoided all of this. In fact, whenever you find a tiny straying, you tried to help them, giving them food and water, making sure to set them free in a relatively safe place. Living in the wild was very dangerous for tinies. Not only they had to scavenge for food and water, it was highly common to be snatched and eaten by some animal. Some dog owners were purposely purchasing tinies to use them as treats to their pets.

In spite all that, you never tried to take any action. You weren't one of those activist politics students. All until few days ago, some friends of yours persuaded you to come along to a protest against shrunken people abuse.
"Come on! It will be fine. It is a peaceful protest. It is coordinated and approved by the police. And also, I know you are with us!" said Lisa, a short redhead activist. She was one of those extreme vegans, also very feminist. You didn't agree with her entire agenda, but you did on the shrunken people matter.
She was very persuasive, and you agreed.

And now you were standing in a crowd. Right in front of the Capitol. All around you people lift signs with anti tiny abuse slogans, crying "Stop eating shrunken people". Here and there you saw some tinies riding shoulders of norms protesting. The protest started peaceful and just, while police securing a parameter around.


During the protest-

1) A group of rival people came across. They are in favor of shrunken people abuse and came to counter-protest and provoke your group. Some of them were going to eat and murder tinies right there in front of you.

2) Someone from behind accidently (or not) pushed you and you bumped into one of the cops, BIG mistake! And now you are in danger of facing attacking an officer accusation.

3) One of the police officers reaching for her pocket to grab a snack. Only after two bites you realize it is a bag of tinies she's snaking on. You can't just ignore that.. (or can you?)
154.title: Protest against tinies abuse, what can go wrong?

choices: Lisa snatches you from the officer and turns to run
The officer pockets you before Lisa can respond
The officer decides to shrink Lisa too
1542.content:
You were standing on the rightmost edge of the crowd, you hadn't brought your own sign but you joined in with the chants whenever one got started. You could see Lisa a little bit ahead and to the left of you waving the sign she'd brought. Looking to your right you could see a few bystanders who weren't actively engaging in the protest but seemed to just be watching. There were also a few police officers you could see, some seemed to just be keeping an eye on things while others looked like they were actively looking for excuses to shrink protesters. Just as you noticed this someone on your left that you hadn't seen bumped you sideways and you stumbled face first into the chest of one of the officers who had been looking for trouble. As you righted yourself you looked up into the face of the officer, she was a brunette woman slightly taller than you and she was glaring down at you. "Oh disturbing an officer huh?" As she spoke the policewoman brandished a device that looked like a cattle prod with a much bulkier handle than normal "I guess you get to test out the new porta-shrinker." You opened your mouth to protest but the officer didn't wait, she just jabbed the stick into your midsection, you felt a jolt pass through your body and the world spun violently around you. You were seeing spots and by the time your vision cleared you realized that it had happened, you'd been shrunk to only about four inches tall. Looking around you were on the pavement, luckily since you'd stumbled out of the crowd you were far enough away that an unaware protester wouldn't step on you, but looking up you saw the policewoman who'd shrunk you reaching down to grab you. You tried to get up and run but in your dazed state it was easy for the massive law enforcement officer to scoop you off the ground. The officer quickly raised you up to her face, smiling at you "Thanks, I hadn't gotten to try that out yet. I like you much better at this size."
"Hey!" The giantess turned her gaze from you as she was distracted, turning to look you saw that it was Lisa who'd shouted out to the officer. "Leave my friend alone!" Lisa was advancing towards the officer and a few of the other nearby protesters started to notice what had happened to you. The officer just smiled at Lisa. Part of you held out hope that Lisa could somehow save you, but you didn't want her to wind up in the same mess you were in.
"Oh?" The officer questioned mockingly "What're you gonna do?" Suddenly...
1542.title: Pushed and bumped into an officer (oh shit!).

choices: She gets away unchallenged.
She hears the policewoman from earlier shouting after her.
15421.content: As the smirking policewoman waves you in front of her to taunt Lisa you watch as the rage builds in Lisa's face. Suddenly Lias lunges forward and snatches you out of the massive officer's hand before spinning on her heel and running the opposite direction, dropping her sign and weaving her way through the crowd. Once the officer recovered from the shock of Lisa just grabbing you out of her hand she started after Lisa, the crowd pushed back against her but she started making progress once she brandished her porta-shrinker at any of the protesters that didn't get out of her way. A few protesters refused to move but were swiftly shrunken and pocketed by the officer as she scanned the crowd for Lisa and you. Meanwhile Lisa clutched you to her chest as she made her way through the crowd, she'd wished she had been taller plenty of times in her life but at least now her shorter stature made it less likely she'd be spotted. You were kinda in panic mode, you were clasped to your friend's chest feeling her body warmth. Normally you'd be happy to be so close to a girl like Lisa but any such feelings were currently being eclipsed by blind terror of all the things that could've happened to you if Lisa hadn't saved you, although they might still happen if she got caught before she could slip away with you. Lisa was trying to think of the best course of action in her head, she had decided that she should probably just make her way to a different edge of the crowd and try to slip back to her place so she could figure out what to do with you. It wasn't like Lisa thought of you like a pet just because you had been shrunken, but you weren't going to be able to safely live like you had before... plus you were actually really cute like this and Lisa wouldn't mind having you around. Lisa was a little ashamed of herself for that last thought and pushed it to the back of her mind. Lisa reached the edge of the crowd, she was a fair distance away from where the incident with the officer had happened so she hoped that if she just acted casual she could walk away with no one the wiser. As Lisa walked away with your little body concelaed in her hand...
15421.title: Friendly Rescue

choices: Accept Lisa's help fully, although you'll need to meet her current roommate
Thank her but try to live as independantly as you can at your new size.
154211.content:
As Lisa left the crowd and noise of the protest behind her she glanced around, not seeing that officer around she felt pretty safe. She looked down at where her hands were clasped to her chest holding her shrunken friend safe and sound, she couldn't help but smile at the feeling of having saved him from what would probably be a terrible hate and now actually holding a friend of hers in her hands. In the warm semidarkness of Lisa's hands you were fighting down a panic attack, just a few minutes ago you'd been a person, and now because of a shrink happy officer society no longer considered you a person. Pretty much the only upside was that Lisa had come to your aid, you really hadn't expected her to do something like that but you could imagine only too well what might've happened to you if she hadn't intervened. Fighting back the panic you realized you could hear the beating of Lisa's heart through her breast that you were being held against, it was a steady and comforting sound. As Lisa walked she found a public bench she could sit down on and have a discussion with her little passenger. In the shelter of Lisa's hands you felt as she sat down, and then the fingers sheltering you from the outside world pulled away letting you see the area around the two of you, and looking up you could see Lisa's face smiling down at you. "Hey" she started "You doing alright down there?"
"I mean, I guess about as well as I could be all things considered" You couldn't just dump all your worries about the rest of your life on Lisa here and now, not after she'd saved you.
"Alright, well that's good, I figured we should talk about what to do next... I mean it's not like I can just keep you in my hands forever."
"Alright" you responded, really wishing it could be as simple as that, that you wouldn't need to worry about the fact that your life as a person in the eyes of society was over. Still the two of you began talking and making plans for the immediate future, you were very lucky to have a friend like Lisa both willing and able to help you figure out where to go from here. As you talked Lisa made it clear she was happy to keep you, not as a pet, you were still a person even tiny, but more as just a tiny extra roommate. The first big road bump would be what to do about your classes, it would be very difficult if not impossible for you to finish college like you now were, but Lisa offered to let you spend the next few days just with her while you figured out something else you could do.
154211.title: She gets away unchallenged.

choices: Processed in the system, and off to the sorting factory
Personal usage, off the books
15422.content:
You hoped and prayed that Lisa will somehow manage to save you from that evil smirking police officer. Maybe she can get the attention of the crowd around her to create social pressure and demand your release.

"Excuse me officer, I don't want to get out of line, but I saw you shrinking my friend and putting him in your pocket. Can you please release him and turn him back? I'm sure he is innocent!" Lisa said to the police woman who shrunk you.
You could hear fear in her voice. Both of you knew that there are some people, even in law enforcement, that were thrilled on every opportunity to have a Tiny.

"Listen carefully lady! Unless you want me to arrest and shrink you too for disturbing an officer, I suggest you move along with that 'peaceful protest' of yours! The tiny you refer to is now in my possession by law!" The police woman replied in a firm tone.
"Yes ma'am" you heard the sad voice of Lisa saying.

Your heart dropped. You never thought your life will come to this point. During your entire life you were careful to not break any law. You were a good citizen, never even pirated songs on the internet. You even never harmed a shrunken person, even when it was legal, because you thought it is wrong. And now your world fell apart. Now you are a shrunken man yourself, not even considered a human being. You were now legally like any other product.

You thought about what is coming for you. Your life is probably going to end sometime soon, as you well know tinies don't live long.
By law, the any officer who shrunk a criminal on spot was obligated to document it and turn it in to the "Shrunken people recycle and sorting system". Most of the tinies ended up there were sent to the food industry, destined to become some food item or cooking ingredient. Some were going to be pets or some sort of slaves, some were going to be used as consumables like disposable 'to go' tissue paper, and some will become wearable accessories. But the vast majority will become food.

That was all in theory. In actual life, there were police officers who took the shrunken person with them for personal use, skipping the red tape. Even when someone was shrunk after a legitimate court, you could find corrupt officials who would make sure the shrunken convict will be delivered to a specific someone (like a very angry ex-wife..) for the right payment.

So what will become of you?

1. Will the police woman process you in the system correctly? You will end up being sent to a shrunken people sorting factory to probably end up somewhere in the food industry, with small chance to end up as something other than food.

2. Or, will she keep you to herself? In that case she might eat you as a snack or take you home with her for any personal use. Who knows, maybe you can even plot an escape?

Both options sound terrifying to you. You recall seeing what other normal people, back when you were normal, did to tinies. The majority would just eat tinies like any other food, ignoring the fact that they used to be normal people. But some took extra fun torturing the tinies. You didn't know what's worse, being swallowed whole and digested alive, or being crushed and chewed up. Being mixed up with some other food items that you hate and painfully dying by stranger sounded like the nastiest way to end your life.
You tried to send away those scary thoughts as you waited inside the police woman's pocket for your fate.
15422.title: Inside the pocket of the police woman

choices: Sent as a regular food item
Sent to another factory, to be altered and become a special food
154221.content:
"ID number?" the policewoman asked in a firm tone.

You answered and continue giving her all your details, while she typed it into the police tinies system computer.

"We have to make sure to delete your details from the normal people data base. You're legally no longer a citizen, no longer a legally human even. When I'm done here, you'll be sent to the Tinies Sorting factory."

These words were like nails in your coffin.

"Enjoy your new being little thing, I hope you'll be tasty and nutritious to whom ever that will eat you!"

TAC!

She ceremoniously typed "Enter" and officially sealed the deal.

Right after that she grabbed you and carried you into a glass container, with about a dozen more tinies already inside, and closed the lid. Everybody inside were grim and nobody felt like talking. Few minutes later another tiny girl were thrown in. her face looked familiar, she probably participated in the same protest and suffered a similar fate. More tinies in various sizes were added every now and then. Next stop is the sorting factory.

-----------------------

Later that day you have finally arrived. Your container is tilted upside down and you fell into a broad conveyer belt with rolling cylinders together with the rest of the tinies from even more containers. You were slowly rolled into a large shelf were tinies began to pile up. Several employees with gloves grabbed one tiny at a time, stripped them completely out of cloths (if they had any) and moved them forward to the cleaning conveyer belt.

The second belt had a similar structure but had a pool with some kind of liquid in it. The employees at this station grabbed a tiny at a time, and with their latex gloved hands dipped the tinies in the liquid, rubbing their fingers roughly on them. While going through all this, you noticed a nice voice, like a guide walking a visiting group through the production line.

" … second stage we clean the shrunken people thoroughly, as appropriate to any other food item. The third stage is meant to insure the shelf life of the tinies. We inject them with a special formula that will make them numb through the process and also important nutrients so they can stay alive and fresh for at least a weak at the stores. Next you can see the automatic laser sorting machine. It will examine each of the tinies in a split second and will tell the computer where the belt should drop each tiny. We have different stations for different shrinking sizes, plus another one for defects. Some tiny's sizes are more suitable for specific uses. For instance, up to 2 cm tinies are better used as topping or integrated as one of multiple cooking ingredients while 15-20 cm shrunks are better used as pets or gourmet meals. Sometimes we have special orders for specific sex or skin color. The defects station is for tinies with a large visible defect like a missing limb, out of the normal size, injured, or even already dead. Remember those, I'll have a surprise for you at the end of the tour."

All the time while she talks and explained the process to the visiting group, you were experiencing it firsthand. The automatic scanner sent you to one of the middle sized station, to be boxed and shipped onward.

--------------------

"Ok, now come with me. We have come to the conclusion of our tour, and now is the time for a tiny surprise, no pun intended hehe. As you can see to your right, there is a low shelf with various tinies. These are the very same defects, and we offer them to our guests as free samples. Sometimes they end up delivered to a pet store to be used as a cheap pet food, and sometimes they are sent to a meat grinder to end up as a ground tiny meat to be frozen and shipped overseas. Nevertheless, feel free to help yourselves, we have plenty."

The group of twenty visitors stormed the defect tinies tray like they were possessed. The medium sized severed tinies were quickly snatched. In a matter of seconds, they transformed from a hurting injured tiny human, to a plop of chewed meat and saliva. Some visitors dug out the extra tiny ones, 0.5 cm tall to swallow whole, several at a time in their mouth. one shrunken man with a broken twisted leg was grabbed by two different people at the same time, a young woman's hand grabbed his upper body while some 17 y/o guy grabbed his lower. They both pulled, causing him to rip apart, each one ate their own half. The tinies were still under the influence of the numbing injection so they put no effort, not that it really mattered. One of the shrunken girls was there due to oversize, she was almost 30 cm. A persistent mother grabbed her to share a taste together with her family, a husband and two teenagers. Each one bite off one of her limbs to chew, the mother then bite her head off and the daughter got the torso. "Hmm.. they're a bit chewy when uncooked at this size" commented the husband.

---------------------

You are being packed into a box with other similar sized shrunken people, your box is sealed and you can hear the employee putting a sticker on it.

Where is your box being sent to?

1. You are a regular food ingredient/snack. You'll be sent to either a restaurant, a fast food place, or a grocery store.

2. Another factory. Some tinies are sent to a special tinies-for-food factory, where they will be altered and augmented. The result products can be anything from a living flavored tiny (flavors can vary from BBQ, to coffee, to spicy, sweet & sour, mint, etc..) packed as a snack or ready for a quick microwave cook, to an even harder alterations that can make you a sort of living chewing gum. In the latter you can see sometimes tinies stuffed with a juicy cream inside, that will spill into the mouth of whoever eats them once they take a bite. Some tinies are being pre added to some other snacks like chocolate or granola bars. Another option, and quite new, is being stuffed with some medical drugs, and being used as a fun to swallow pill with the active medicine substance inside.
154221.title: Tinies Sorting Factory

choices: Take the oppertunity and make a break for it.
Wait obediently.
154222.content: You sat in the pocket of the massive police woman, unable to really do anything but wait. You could only listened as just on the other side of the thing cloth barrier of the pocket the tinies rights protest continued, you could also hear the sounds of the giantess officer's body as you were pretty well pressed against it by the fabric of her pocket. Still nothing lasts forever and eventually the protest wound down, as you listened to the other protesters leaving you felt movement as the policewoman began walking. You had to infer a lot of what happened from the movement you could feel and the sounds you heard. You felt the police woman walk until she opened a car door, sat down, and started the engine. The drive was a new sensation, not at all like the swaying motion of the giantess walking but you were constantly being vibrated by the engine running. When your captress finally stopped and got out of the car you heard a lot of other voices as she went through several more doors before things got quite again. And then you felt a shifting in your fabric prison, you felt the whole thing drop downwards and then be lifted again and set down on a hard surface. It takes you a second to realize that the police uniform the pocket is a part of is no longer on the police woman. Since the pocket is now lying on its side you can crawl out, and once you do so you get your first real view of your surroundings since your abduction. You seemed to have just crawled out of the pants pocket, looking around you and the woman's pants were on a bench in what looked like a locker-room. It wasn't hard to guess you were in the locker-room at the police office. Looking up you could see your titanic kidnapper standing in front of an open locker right next to the bench you were on, it looked like you two were the only ones actually in the room at the moment. At the moment the giantess officer was pulling off the shirt she'd worn on duty over her head, meaning that she couldn't see and wouldn't be able to for the next few seconds, with her pants already off this did just leave her in her black bra and panties. You had two options here, since the officer had taken you with her while getting changed to go off duty you could safely assume she wasn't going to turn you in to the sorting facility, probably planning to keep you for herself. You could take advantage of the giantess's momentary blindness to make an escape, you'd be alone in the police office but at least no one would be actually holding your life in their hands, alternatively you could wait for her to finish and maybe she'd reward you for not trying anything? Based on how she'd acted at the protest you weren't sure trusting her at all would be a good idea, but you didn't exactly have anyone else at the moment. The chance would be gone very soon, after a moment's indecision you decided to...
154222.title: Personal usage, off the books

choices: the policewoman sees you, but you slip away before she can recapture you
the policewoman's giant foot slams down between you and the door, she's pissed
1542221.content: It would be a bad idea to bet on the mercy of a policewoman who not only enforced the horrible system you lived in, but also clearly broke the law when it was convenient for her, or else she would've turned you over to be properly sorted. Luckily for you, not only was the policewoman momentarily blinded but one of the legs of her pants draped all the way from the top of the bench you were on to the cold locker room floor. You quickly jumped onto the trailing pantleg, your feet immediately went out from under you and you rolled all the way down to the floor. You landed in a dizzy mess on the floor, but it had been quick and after a moment you were up and away. You started sprinting flat out towards the door that presumably led to the rest of the police station, it might not be the best plan but it'd get you one step closer to freedom, plus it was all you could really think of in the heat of the moment. Throwing a glance over your shoulder you saw the massive policewoman, still only wearing her bra and panties, had picked up her pants, after searching the pockets for a moment a look of realization comes over her face and her eyes begin darting around the locker room. She'd clearly realized you had gotten loose, if you got under the door ahead of her that would hopefully buy you some time, but if she spotted you she could probably catch up to you easily considering how much longer each of her steps were. As you near the your destination...
1542221.title: Take the oppertunity and make a break for it.

choices: "Y'know what, we'll see how you do, I can always eat you later if it comes up."
"Eh, your best use is still as a snack."
1542222.content:
You decided to just sit on the bench next to the police woman's pants while she got changed, as the giantess pulled her shirt off she tossed it onto the bench on top of her pants but noticed you waiting patiently. It took considerable willpower to sit still and let the giantess pick you up off of the bench, as she raised you to her face you were somewhat overwhelmed by the sight of more exposed skin then you had ever thought you'd see in your life. After studying you for a second the nearly naked officer spoke "What were you doing just sitting there?"
"Well" You had to concentrate on acting calm, not thinking about how easily she could squish you or just toss you into her mouth "I figured that you'd appreciate it if I didn't try to escape when you weren't looking."
"Huh" The giantess considered for a moment "Well I had been planning to just eat you since I missed lunch while policing you and your hippie friends at the protest." Your heart dropped a bit at that news but you had to keep a straight face, you knew this kind of person didn't see tinies as people so begging wouldn't help, you had to act calm and make her want to keep you alive and well.
"Well..." You started, brain working overtime to try and find your next words "I won't be any trouble, I can be helpful in fact if you don't eat me. 154222211.content:
Her words make you worry a little bit, tinies are not usually used for pleasant tasks.

"Oh well, it's better than being in her stomach" you think to yourself as Racheal makes her way to her car.

The drive back to Racheal's house takes 20 minutes. When Racheal gets inside her home she scoops you up out of her shirt pocket and places you on the coffee table.

"Ok little guy" Racheal says. "I have a date with my boyfriend tonight and I need to look nice. The first job I have for you is to paint my finger nails."

You nod your head in acknowledgement.

Without saying another word, Racheal leaves the room and comes back with blue nail polish. She sits on her couch, plucks you off her coffee table and brings you to one of the couch arms.

"Ok, I am going to watch T.V while you work. He will be here in 1 hour to take me to dinner so you better be done in time for me to get dressed and do my makeup" Racheal says threateningly.

You don't say a thing, right away you begin painting her nails. At your size it takes longer than you'd expect but you manage to get all five of her fingers painted in just under 15 minutes. Seeing that you completed her right hand, Racheal pauses the show she is watching and inspects your work.

"Wow, I'm actually impressed little guy." she says with a genuine smile. "Now do that to the other side."

Racheal scoops you off the shoulder of the couch and brings you to her left hand. It's a little harder to stay still since her left hand is on the couch cushion. Just as you're about to begin painting, her cellphone rings. Racheal quickly moves her hand away from you accidentally knocking you down.

"It's my boyfriend!" she exclaims in excitement. "This is none of your business so I'm going to go the kitchen to take this call. If you try to escape I will eat you." she says to you in her stern cop voice.

Figuring that you're lucky to still be alive, you promise to stay put as Racheal happily goes to the other room to talk to her boyfriend. You can't hear the conversation so you just patiently wait for Racheal to return so you can continue your task with as much dignity that you have left.

About 15 minutes later you see Racheal slowly walk back into the living room with a cold, emotionless expression on her face. She doesn't even check to make sure you haven't tried to escape, she just slowly sits back down on the couch not even looking in your direction. You look up at her wondering why she looks, so, dead. Suddenly, Racheal begins to tear up and starts crying uncontrollably. She buries her face into a pillow and continues to cry. You are shocked, up until now she's been nothing but scary and cruel to you. She kidnapped you and almost ate you but now she's sobbing with what seems are tears of great sadness.

You awkwardly walk up to her giant head and wonder what to do next. You realize this could be the perfect time to escape, on the other hand you could never resist comforting people when they're crying. No matter how mean or cruel they are.

What do you do?

15422221111.content:
"What do you want?!" Rachel barked, trying not to start crying again.

"I-I just was wondering why you're crying" you reply nervously.

"What do you care? You're just a worthless fucking tiny!" Racheal says as she starts to cry again.

Racheal buries her face into her pillow and continues to cry. You pluck up courage and try to speak to her again.

"Listen" you say in a gentle voice. "I know there's something wrong with you and it sounds like you need someone to talk to. I know you see me as 'worthless' and I know that you're probably going to eat me as soon as you get board with me, but as long as I'm here you can talk to me about whatever is making you upset. You have the right to be sad. I just want to know what's wrong and listen to whatever feelings you wish to share."

Still inches away from your face, Racheal slowly lifts her head up and stares at you again. You calmly look straight into her eyes, hoping she won't hurt you.

"Ok fine, you want to know so bad? Fine!" Rachal said wiping her tears away. "I had this big expensive date planned for my boyfriend to celebrate our anniversary, and he just told me that he broke up with me for another woman he met while he was out of town a month ago. Apparently, he was having an affair with her for a few weeks and they had just skipped town. He called me while he was on the road."

"Wow...." you say gently. "I'm really sorry."

"I mean, how could I have been so stupid? He seemed so kind when I first met him, I guess I'm just easily tricked. Nobody ever really takes me seriously, I guess that's why he left me" cried Rachel.

You've always been an empathetic person, after all that's why you went to the tinies' rights rally today. You can't help but try and comfort Rachal, even though she was a cop who wanted to eat you.

"You are a very strong and intelligent woman." you say, putting your tiny hand on her leg. "And trust me, people take you very seriously. I was never more scared in my entire life when I ran into you today..."

"People only started to take me seriously after I became a cop" Rachal said, sniffling. "All my life, people never took me seriously but when I became a cop suddenly I was feared and for the first time in my life I felt confident and had real power. But even that isn't good enough for men I guess."

"Well" you say. "I kind of understand how you feel, I was always picked on for being shy and nerdy throughout my life. That's why I went to that rally today, because I wanted to fight for the little guy. No pun intended."

"Wow" Rachel said, now looking right at you, like she was actually happy to be talking to you. "That's actually really noble. I guess, I've become too hot headed as a cop."

"And for what it's worth, I know what it's like to be cheated on like that. About 6 months ago my longtime girlfriend dumped me for some guy she met at the gym." you continue

"So you do know how it feels" replied Rachal thoughtfully. "But, why are you being so nice to a woman who was going to eat you?"

You thought about her question for a minute.

"I guess, I always had the impulsive need to try and comfort someone when I see them crying. No matter how mean they may be." you reply. "And look, I know you spent so much time, money, and energy on a nice date that you have no one to have with now. If you would like to not have it go to waste, you could go with me."

Rachal's slowly sits up and looks at you intensely.

What is her response?

Staring up at the massive expanses of smooth skin revealed as Racheal slowly undressed was mesmerizing. But one thought in the back of your brain was panicking, you'd heard of tinies being crushed to death, or lost inside any number of orifices during a normal sized person's bouts of passion. Racheal might be careful enough not to seriously hurt you, but knowing her views on tiny rights she might not care enough to slow down for your safety. As Racheal finished undressing and reached out one massive hand to capture you it was quickly made clear that...

15422222.content:
The policewoman's dull green eyes bore daggers into you, the only sound between them the exhaust from her nearby nostrils and the distant ambience of the police station at work. You hadn't taken the chance to really look at her, but now so close to her face, you could see how strict her features were. She must've taken the utmost care of herself from the condition of her pores contrasted with her hardened expression. She'd acted casually and almost like what she'd done to him was a joke, but her face betrayed a complex depth of character beyond what you'd seen so far. Maybe you'd get the chance to learn what it's like to be a young cop's pet or confidante and understand how she thinks, how she lives.

A gust of hot air blasted you as she sighed, "Eh. If I wanted a pet, I'd buy one." Your heart sank, and seeing the hope in your small eyes fade so quickly caused her to grin, "What? You thought you were special? Like I haven't heard that schtick dozens of times already? Don't kid yourself."

Every syllable hit you like a punch in the gut. Surely there was some way to appeal to her? "I-I'm sorry. I didn't mean to presume, I just thought-"

"Look, I'm off duty, it's been a long day, and frankly, I don't play with my food." She cut you off so bluntly, you barely registered when her mouth opened wider following the end of her sentence until you started being drawn forward towards her dimly lit, dripping maw.

"No! Please! I'll do whatever! I'm too big, there's so many other ways you could-" Too late, your pleas were muffled by a throbbing tongue that rose up to silence you while getting a preliminary taste. More of you was pushed in until her thin lips sealed around your thighs. The humidity and slime were indistinguishably horrid on entry once the light from beyond her jaws was extinguished, plunging you into a slobbery chasm of drool and tastebuds. Your assessment of being too big might be right though. Your legs still kicked outside her mouth, and the rest of you filled up her tongue considerably. You were obviously a mouthful, she wouldn't dare try and swallow you? Then again, how easy would it be for the incisors digging into your rear to clamp down hard a sever your lower half, ending your life prematurely. While you initially flailed and tried to fight, it was soon apparent that she could make life more miserable and far more brief if she wanted. So you stopped struggling, adopting a passive approach like you'd done before when you had the chance to escape your devourer.

She must've appreciated your submission, or at least your flavor, since she hummed approvingly while starting to earnestly suck on you. Being naked exposed every inch of your salty skin to her wanting tongue, drawing the flavor and fear out of you. The few tears you managed to produce were utterly insignificant compared to the gallons of spit surrounding you.

The tongue bucked, a slurping sound trembled your environment, and you felt your legs pulled in up to your feet. Now your face was pressed into larger taste buds that more profoundly smothered you. You couldn't be moved past her teeth as big as you were, locked in the center of her tongue as it roughly slathered you against the roof of her mouth. Except what was once an all hard palette had started becoming soft around his head and shoulders. You were farther in the mouth, closer to the throat. The smacks and slurps surrounding you were joined by a distant gurgling, and ever prominent heartbeat, and the rush of her breath now going in and out from her nose above more powerful than ever. A sloppy tendril traced behind your head and neck as you were heaved back again, and finally your face was freed from the fleshy compaction.

You coughed harshly, voiding the saliva and mucus that had forced its way into your mouth and opening your eyes to find a throbbing, rippling drop just below. Her epiglottis was showing, sealing the tube of her esophagus and allowing her to breath. There was not telling how long it'd stay shut, but when the muscles of her throat became more oppressive, and the suction from her tongue finally pulled you all the way past her lips, closing behind your feet, you had a feeling you wouldn't have to wait-

GLLLUURK

-The internal world sealed around you, and unfathomable feminine flesh pulled irresistibly downward into a tight tunnel of slime and muscle. Your face was smothered again, forced to endure the ringing pounds from her heart as you another swallow pull the rest of your body into her throat. That was it. You were eaten alive, squeezing deeper and deeper into the young, jaded cop's body. The vacuum of her lungs the only notification of how many seconds passed while moving upside down to your final stop until your head rammed into a dense seal. Your animal mind hoped that this was some sort of rescue, something that was here to stop you from the suffering down below. Your logical mind knew better, and the seal squelched open to accept your head and shoulders before gravity returned to do its job and yanked you the rest of the way through.

You fell disgracefully onto a wrinkled slope basted in slime, sliding down into the gut of the attractive but cruel officer.

You slid down the esophagus of the policewoman, being kneaded downwards by the giantess's throat muscles pushing in on you from all sides. You can try to struggle and squirm but it's all ultimately fruitless, you can do nothing but listen to the bodily noises of the massive officer as you slide deeper and deeper into her. Soon you pass through the final seal and plop into the stomach, more spacious than the throat but still not roomy. The fleshy walls gently pulsed around you, it was pitch black and a noxious odor assaulted your nose. You could do nothing but sit in the slime and darkness, when you'd decided to go to the protest you couldn't have imagined you'd actually be digested for it.
On the outside the officer rubbed her bare stomach and smiled at the satisfying weight of a shrunken snack settled in her belly. That one had been almost too big to swallow whole but she'd always loved the feeling of swallowing down the biggest little victim she could manage. It was a little disappointing that this guy wasn't struggling much but he'd still tasted great and felt even better. And so the officer finished getting changed to go home for the evening. Inside of her gut you felt as if gravity lurched every time she bent over and felt an earthquake shake your living prison every time she took a step. And so you ended, digested by a police woman who protected the very system you'd protested. she'd forget you by the time she arrived at home and go on to eat many more tinies in the days to come.

info.brief_description: Today, the criminal, poor, and unlucky are condemned to be shrunk. Where do you fit in?
info.description:
In the near future, shrinking technology is common place as a tool for the federal government to shrink condemned and incarcerated criminals. Soon, new legislation passes that makes those below a certain poverty line or with any minor criminal record legible for detainment and diminishment. These new "Tinies" are quickly commoditized as a means to buff the economy, sold as pets, food, decor, entertainment, you name it. Dozens of industries popped up over time to take advantage of the new trends made possible by the unorthodox population shift in human history.

So who are you? An unfortunate soul condemned to a reduced sentence, or a normal person enjoying the perks of the new world order? A survivor making it on your own in the wilds, or a kind soul looking to save the wrongly converted? The choice is yours...

Looking for interesting characters and dynamics in this setting. While I'm mostly hoping for vore adds, I'm open to any number of content covering whatever kink you wish! Points to detailed posts and creative story paths!

Thanks to The1SwagKing (37) } for recommending I finally put something up on this site. Likely gonna populate some of the threads with some of my preexisting stories that take place in this world, but feel free to come up with whatever chapters and ideas you wish!

Must write substantial entries, minimum one five sentence paragraph, and stay consistent with the perspective of whatever entries came before you. I don't mind different threads following first, second, or third person POVs.
